author: gdaniels
msg: Don't actually require type mapping classes to be present at WSDD
construction time.  Instead, build the type mapping registries the first
time they're asked for.  This allows tools to work with WSDD in environments
with different classpaths than the actual server.

author: gdaniels
msg: OK, removeAttribute() just does NOT seem to be happy - keeps breaking
for me every time I run the functional tests within ant, but not from the
normal command line or within IDEA.  Refactor code to use
setAttribute() instead.

author: gdaniels
msg: Improve customized JWS class dir code.
* Cache a few more things in AxisServlet
* Better interpretation of properties to work in various environments
* Put the generated .java file in the output directory
* Default the SimpleAxisServer's jws class dir to "jwsClasses"

author: scheu
msg: The following code was requested by Paul Mietz Egli.
SAX can break up values into 5k chunks.  The
base64Deserializer is changed to collect all the data
before decoding.

author: gdaniels
msg: *sigh*
Still seemed to be problems with the removeAttr() call, this seems to
clear it up... apparently people's implementations of this (xerces vs.
crimson, etc) are a bit touchy.
